meanings.definition: The action or process of enrolling or registering in a college or university.
meanings.sent1: Her matriculations at the university were smooth and efficient.
meanings.sent2: The matriculations for the new semester will begin next week.
meanings.sent3: During the chaotic matriculations, she accidentally signed up for the wrong class.
meanings.sent4: His matriculations into the prestigious university opened new doors for him.
meanings.sent5: The matriculations process can be overwhelming for first-time students.

meanings.definition: The list of students enrolled in a college or university.
meanings.sent1: The matriculations showed a significant increase in student numbers this year.
meanings.sent2: She checked the matriculations to confirm her name was on the list.
meanings.sent3: The matriculations unexpectedly included a famous actor as a student.
meanings.sent4: The matriculations resembled a colorful mosaic of diverse individuals.
meanings.sent5: The matriculations list was proudly displayed in the main hall of the university.
